pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 4 $(li)Treasure = True $(li)Tradeable = False $(li)Rarity = Very_Rare $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Deals bonus magic damage on-hit scaling with Stacks. $(br)Stacks can be gained by killing higher entities. $(br)Stacks are capped with PlayerLevel

pages.title: Transcended
pages.text: Required Level = 1000 $(br2)Stacks are uncapped, however each individual stack can fail to be gained
